<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Cookie Clicker Game</title>
    <style>
        body {
            font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
            text-align: center;
            background-color: #f4f4f4;
        }
        #cookie {
            cursor: pointer;
            width: 200px;
            height: 200px;
            background-image: url('data:image/jpeg;base64,'); /* Replace with your cookie image URL */
            background-size: cover;
            display: inline-block;
            margin: 20px auto;
        }
        #shop {
            margin-top: 20px;
        }
        .button {
            padding: 10px 20px;
            margin: 5px;
            background-color: #4CAF50;
            color: white;
            border: none;
            border-radius: 5px;
            cursor: pointer;
        }
        .button:disabled {
            background-color: #ccc;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <h1>Cookie Clicker Game</h1>
    <div id="cookie"></div>
    <h2 id="cookieCount">Cookies: 0</h2>
    <h3 id="cps">Cookies per second: 0</h3>
    <div id="shop">
        <button class="button" id="upgrade1">Upgrade: +1 CPS (Cost: 10 Cookies)</button>
        <button class="button" id="upgrade2">Upgrade: +5 CPS (Cost: 50 Cookies)</button>
    </div>
    <script>
        let cookies = 0;
        let cookiesPerClick = 1;
        let cookiesPerSecond = 0;
        const cookieElement = document.getElementById('cookie');
        const cookieCountElement = document.getElementById('cookieCount');
        const cpsElement = document.getElementById('cps');
        const upgrade1Button = document.getElementById('upgrade1');
        const upgrade2Button = document.getElementById('upgrade2');
        cookieElement.addEventListener('click', () => {
            cookies += cookiesPerClick;
            updateDisplay();
        });
        upgrade1Button.addEventListener('click', () => {
            if (cookies >= 10) {
                cookies -= 10;
                cookiesPerSecond += 1;
                updateDisplay();
            }
        });
        upgrade2Button.addEventListener('click', () => {
            if (cookies >= 50) {
                cookies -= 50;
                cookiesPerSecond += 5;
                updateDisplay();
            }
        });
        function updateDisplay() {
            cookieCountElement.innerText = `Cookies: ${cookies}`;
            cpsElement.innerText = `Cookies per second: ${cookiesPerSecond}`;
            checkUpgradeAvailability();
        }
        function checkUpgradeAvailability() {
            upgrade1Button.disabled = cookies < 10;
            upgrade2Button.disabled = cookies < 50;
        }
        setInterval(() => {
            cookies += cookiesPerSecond;
            updateDisplay();
        }, 1000);
    </script>

</body>
</html>
